reviewText:
I recommend the completes seasons 1 to 5 of the girls next door because we can see and review the life of Kendra,Holly and Bridget on the mansion.
The pictures are not censured and it is a pleasure.
For all men and women who love the playboy bunny.

the girls next door are smart, fun, and very thoughtful and kind hearted.  The show isn't the same without them.  Best Wishes to Holly, Bridget, and Kendra.  Keep up the good work and continue doing what you do best and that is bringing a happiness to people through all that you do.
